trans-unit.source: Represents a Boolean field that is displayed as a check box in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 表示为数据绑定控件中的复选框显示的布尔字段。

trans-unit.source: The CheckBoxField class is used by data-bound controls (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) to display the value of a Boolean data field in a check box.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件使用 CheckBoxField 类 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) 以显示一个复选框布尔数据字段的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The CheckBoxField object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used.
trans-unit.target: 根据使用它的数据绑定控件以不同方式显示该 CheckBoxField 对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays a CheckBoxField object as a column, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control displays it as a row.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件显示为一列，CheckBoxField 对象时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件将其显示为一行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A check box is disabled (read-only) until the data-bound control displays a record that contains the check box in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 复选框 （只读） 前禁用数据绑定控件将显示包含编辑模式中的复选框的记录。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to put a record into edit mode, see the documentation for the parent control that contains the CheckBoxField object.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何将一个记录置于编辑模式的详细信息，请参阅包含 CheckBoxField 对象的父控件的文档。

trans-unit.source: To specify the field to display in a CheckBoxField object, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A> property with the field's name.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要显示 CheckBoxField 对象中显示的字段，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A>具有在字段的名称的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because a check box can display only a selected or an unselected state, a CheckBoxField object can be bound only to a field with a Boolean data type or a string that can be parsed by <xref:System.Boolean.Parse%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 复选框可以显示选定的或未选中的状态，因为 CheckBoxField 对象可以只可绑定到具有 Boolean 数据类型或可以通过<xref:System.Boolean.Parse%2A>.</xref:System.Boolean.Parse%2A>分析的字符串的域

trans-unit.source: You can display a caption next to each check box by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置显示每个复选框旁边标题<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField.Text%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: A CheckBoxField object is hidden in a data-bound control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在数据绑定中隐藏 CheckBoxField 对象控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the value of a field from being modified in edit mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止在编辑模式中被修改的字段的值，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: In data-bound controls that support inserting records (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control), you can hide a CheckBoxField object in insert mode by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在将记录插入该支持数据绑定控件 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件)，你可以通过设置隐藏在插入模式中的 CheckBoxField 对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: You can customize the header and footer sections of a CheckBoxField object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以自定义 CheckBoxField 对象页眉和页脚部分。

trans-unit.source: To display a caption in the header or footer sections, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 若要在页眉或页脚部分中显示标题，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A>属性，分别。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是在标头部分中显示文本，你可以通过设置内显示图像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The header section can be hidden in the CheckBoxField object by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 标头部分可以通过设置隐藏 CheckBoxField 对象中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some data-bound controls (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 一些数据绑定控件 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件) 可显示或隐藏控件的整个标头部分。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: These data-bound controls do not support the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> property for an individual bound field.
trans-unit.target: 这些数据绑定控件不支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>单个绑定字段的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the control's `ShowHeader` property.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示或隐藏的数据绑定控件的整个标头部分 （如果可用），请使用控件的`ShowHeader`属性。

trans-unit.source: You also can customize the appearance of the CheckBoxField object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以自定义 CheckBoxField 对象 （如字体颜色、 背景色等） 的外观的设置的字段的不同部分的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: |Style property|Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>|The style settings for the child Web server controls of the CheckBoxField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>|The style settings for the footer section of the CheckBoxField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A>|The style settings for the header section of the CheckBoxField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>|The style settings for the data items in the CheckBoxField object.|
trans-unit.target: |样式属性 |说明 | |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>|CheckBoxField 对象的子 Web 服务器控件的样式设置。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>|CheckBoxField 对象页脚部分的样式设置。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A>|CheckBoxField 对象的标头部分的样式设置。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>|CheckBoxField 对象中的数据项的样式设置。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>的新实例

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数通常用时将字段添加到的动态创建的数据绑定控件。

trans-unit.source: To dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object to a data-bound control, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection.
trans-unit.target: 动态地添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>对象转换为数据绑定控件，创建一个新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>对象、 设置其属性，并将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中，添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that all fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 动态，你可以将字段添加到的数据绑定控件中，尽管强烈建议，所有字段可静态声明，然后显示或隐藏，根据需要。

trans-unit.source: Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 静态声明所有字段会减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The ApplyFormatInEditMode property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class, but is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> class.
trans-unit.target: ApplyFormatInEditMode 属性继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>类，但不适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to access the value of this property will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName> exception.
trans-unit.target: 任何尝试访问此属性的值将引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>异常。</xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported, and throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不受支持，并且引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read or set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 尝试读取或设置此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The ConvertEmptyStringToNull property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class, but is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> class.
trans-unit.target: ConvertEmptyStringToNull 属性继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>类，但不适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to access the value of this property will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName> exception.
trans-unit.target: 任何尝试访问此属性的值将引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>异常。</xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported and throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不支持，并且引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read or set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 尝试读取或设置此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> object to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将当前的属性复制<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>到指定的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The CopyProperties method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object created by the CopyProperties method.
trans-unit.target: CopyProperties 方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法复制当前的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>CopyProperties 方法创建对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> to copy the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>以复制当前属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>到。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个空<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The CreateField method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object to which the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object can be copied.
trans-unit.target: CreateField 方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来创建一个空<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>与对象的属性的当前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>可以复制对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data field to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要绑定到的数据字段的名称<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataField property to specify the name of the data field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object.
trans-unit.target: DataField 属性用于指定要绑定到的数据字段的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: The name of the data field to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要将绑定到的数据字段的名称<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定字段的值的显示格式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The DataFormatString property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class, but is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> class.
trans-unit.target: 数据属性继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>类，但不适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to access the value of this property will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName> exception.
trans-unit.target: 任何尝试访问此属性的值将引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>异常。</xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: 一个格式设置字符串，指定字段的值的显示格式。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported, and throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不受支持，并且引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read or set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 尝试读取或设置此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Fills the specified <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> object with the values from the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 填充指定<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>对象从指定的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The ExtractValuesFromCell method is provided as a convenient way to retrieve the values of the fields from the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> object in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object.
trans-unit.target: 作为一种简便方式检索从指定的字段的值提供 ExtractValuesFromCell 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>对象在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 主要由控件开发人员使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method does not have a return value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法没有返回值。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the field values are returned by reference through the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> object passed in for the `dictionary` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 相反，通过引用返回的字段值<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>对象传入的`dictionary`参数。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After the method has been called, iterate through the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> object to access the field values.
trans-unit.target: 调用该方法后，循环访问<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>对象来访问的字段值。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> object contains read-only field values, you must pass in `true` for the `includeReadOnly` parameter to include those values.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>对象包含只读字段值，则必须传递`true`为`includeReadOnly`参数以包含这些值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> used to store the values of the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>用于存储指定的单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> that contains the values to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> ，其中包含要检索的值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the values of read-only fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包括只读字段; 的值否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value used for the field's value when rendering the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> object in a designer.
trans-unit.target: 检索用于在字段的值，在呈现时的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>在设计器中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeValue method is a helper method used to determine what value to display for a field when rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object in a designer.
trans-unit.target: GetDesignTimeValue 方法是一个帮助器方法，用于确定要在呈现时为字段显示的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>在设计器中的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: If real data can not be retrieved from the data source at design time, the value returned by this method is displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果真实数据不从数据源检索在设计时，此方法返回的值是改为显示。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The HtmlEncode property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class, but is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> class.
trans-unit.target: HtmlEncode 属性继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>类，但不适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to access the value of this property will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName> exception.
trans-unit.target: 任何尝试访问此属性的值将引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>异常。</xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported and throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不支持，并且引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read or set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 尝试读取或设置此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the formatted text should be HTML encoded before it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应 HTML 编码之前它将显示带格式的文本。

trans-unit.source: HTML-encoding values can help prevent cross-site scripting attacks and malicious content from being displayed.
trans-unit.target: HTML 编码的值可帮助防止跨站点脚本攻击，恶意内容显示。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text should be HTML encoded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果文本应为 HTML 编码;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> object to the specified row state.
trans-unit.target: 初始化指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref>到指定的行状态的对象。

trans-unit.source: The InitializeDataCell method is a helper method used to initialize a cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object.
trans-unit.target: InitializeDataCell 方法是一个帮助器方法，用于初始化中的单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref>初始化。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed for a field when the field's value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置字段的值时为字段显示的文本<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The NullDisplayText property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class, but is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> class.
trans-unit.target: NullDisplayText 属性继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>类，但不适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to access the value of this property will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName> exception.
trans-unit.target: 任何尝试访问此属性的值将引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>异常。</xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text displayed for a field with a value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 为具有的值的字段显示的文本<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported, and throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不受支持，并且引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read or set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 尝试读取或设置此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Binds the value of a field to a check box in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将字段的值绑定到处于的复选框<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The OnDataBindField method is a helper method used to bind the value of a field in the data source to a corresponding check box in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object.
trans-unit.target: OnDataBindField 方法是用于将数据源中的字段的值绑定到相应的复选框中的帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the control supports HTML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示控件是否支持 HTML 编码。

trans-unit.source: HTML encoding is not supported for this control, and this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件不支持 HTML 编码，且此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the caption to display next to each check box in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在每个复选框旁边显示的标题<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The Text property is used to display a caption next to each check box in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object.
trans-unit.target: Text 属性用于显示在每个复选框旁边标题<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: If the Text property is set to an empty string, no caption is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果文本属性设置为一个空字符串，不显示任何标题。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > All check boxes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object share the same caption.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 中的所有复选框<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>对象共享相同的标题。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The caption displayed next to each check box in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在每个复选框旁边显示的标题<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the controls contained in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> object support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 确定控件是否包含在<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>对象支持回调。

trans-unit.source: The ValidateSupportsCallback method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: ValidateSupportsCallback 方法是用于确定控件是否包含在一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>对象支持回调。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: This method has been implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported.
trans-unit.target: 此方法已作为空方法 （不包含任何代码的方法） 以指示支持回调实现。
